javax.enterprise.deploy.model

Class XpathEvent

  • java.lang.Object
    • javax.enterprise.deploy.model.XpathEvent

  • public final class XpathEvent
extends Object
    An Event class describing ConfigBeans being added/subtracted from a server configuration.
